snippet: With few exceptions, exporters at the opening of the Canton Fair, China’s main export show, said demand from emerging markets and the United States was beginning to recover.
abstract: New and somewhat more optimistic mood takes hold among Chinese exporters at the Canton Fair; with few exceptions, exporters at China's main export show say demand from emerging markets and the United States is beginning to recover.
lead_paragraph: With few exceptions, exporters at the opening of the Canton Fair, China’s main export show, said demand from emerging markets and the United States was beginning to recover.

headline.seo: Signs of Possible Recovery Buoy Chinese Exporters
headline.main: Signs of Possible Recovery Buoy Chinese Exporters
headline.print_headline: Signs of Possible Recovery Buoy Chinese Exporters
